content: what is  PS plugin: make triptych consistent \"look\"?

A PS (Photoshop) plugin is a software extension that adds extra functionality to Adobe Photoshop. 

The "make triptych consistent 'look'" plugin is likely a specific tool or filter that is used to create a consistent appearance or visual style for a triptych. A triptych is a three-panel artwork or photograph usually displayed side by side. This plugin would likely provide options to adjust various characteristics like color tones, saturation, sharpness, or other visual settings to ensure a uniform and harmonious look across all three panels of the triptych.
